topic.title: Registered Types
topic.p: Reflectable C++ types under some C++ namespaces are usually registered with other names in other namespaces. Here are all types in this library that are registered.
When VCZH_DEBUG_NO_REFLECTION is off, types will not be registered.

ul.li:
From :: to ::system
void -> Void
float -> Single
double -> Double
bool -> Boolean
wchar_t -> Char

From ::vl to ::system
vuint8_t -> UInt8
vuint16_t -> UInt16
vuint32_t -> UInt32
vuint64_t -> UInt64
vint8_t -> Int8
vint16_t -> Int16
vint32_t -> Int32
vint64_t -> Int64
WString -> String
DateTime
Locale

From ::vl::reflection to ::system
IDescriptable -> Interface
DescriptableObject -> ReferenceType

From ::vl::reflection::description to ::system
VoidValue -> Void
Value -> Object
IValueEnumerator -> Enumerator
IValueEnumerable -> Enumerable
IValueReadonlyList -> ReadonlyList
IValueList -> List
IValueObservableList -> ObservableList
IValueReadonlyDictionary -> ReadonlyDictionary
IValueDictionary -> Dictionary
IValueInterfaceProxy -> InterfaceProxy
IValueFunctionProxy -> Function
IValueSubscription -> Subscription
IValueCallStack -> CallStack
IValueException -> Exception

From ::vl::reflection::description to ::system::reflection
IBoxedValue -> BoxedValue
IBoxedValue::CompareResult -> CompareResult
IValueType -> ValueType
IEnumType -> EnumType
ISerializableType -> SerializableType
ITypeInfo -> TypeInfo
ITypeInfo::Decorator -> Decorator
IMemberInfo -> MemberInfo
IEventHandler -> EventHandler
IEventInfo -> EventInfo
IPropertyInfo -> PropertyInfo
IParameterInfo -> ParameterInfo
IMethodInfo -> MethodInfo
IMethodGroupInfo -> MethodGroupInfo
TypeDescriptorFlags
ITypeDescriptor -> TypeDescriptor
